name: Drone Pizza Delivery 3D
description:
Fly remote controlled drone and deliver pizzas to customers on time.

Collect stars and hidden diamonds for extra score and energy.

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive simulation game.

Suitable for children and all ages. Enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends circle.
